name: ALLIANCE FOR CONNECTED CARE
description: 501(c)(6) organization of health care and technology companies
sampleDescriptions: Telemedicine reimbursement; CONNECT for Health Act.
Telehealth coverage and reimbursement; H.R. 748, Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act or the CARES Act.
Telehealth coverage and reimbursement; H.R. 7663, Protecting Access to Post-COVID-19 Telehealth Act; S. 4375, Telehealth Modernization Act.
Telehealth coverage and reimbursement; H.R. 1332/S. 368, Telehealth Modernization Act; Connect for Health Act; H.R. 366, Protecting Access to Telehealth Post-COVID-19 Act

Telehealth coverage and reimbursement; H.R. 1332/S. 368, Telehealth Modernization Act; Connect for Health Act; H.R. 366, Protecting Access to Telehealth Post-COVID-19 Act; tele-mental health legislation; FY 2023 Labor-HHS-Education appropriations; H.R. 7573, Telehealth Extension and Evaluation Act; S. 1988, Protecting Rural Telehealth Access Act; H.R. 7375, Benefit Expansion for Workers Act of 2022; telehealth reimbursement for critical access hospitals; interstate licensure.

Telehealth Expansion Act (S. 1704/H.R. 5981); Telehealth Modernization Act (S. 368); Primary and Virtual Care Affordability Act (H.R. 5541); telehealth and mental health; interstate licensure; social determinants of health; CONNECT for Health Act of 2021 (S. 1512).
Issues related to high-deductible heath plan treatment of telehealth services; Drug Enforcement Administration telehealth issues; VA telehealth issues.
